meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of archosaurs.
meanings.sent1: The ancient bones belonged to an archosaurian creature.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed many archosaurian fossils.
meanings.sent3: The archosaurian tracks in the sand looked like a dance routine.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as swift and powerful as an archosaurian predator.
meanings.sent5: The archosaurian features of the dinosaur made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or belonging to the Archosauria.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the archosaurian species for years.
meanings.sent2: The archosaurian lineage dates back millions of years.
meanings.sent3: The archosaurian family reunion was a roaring success.
meanings.sent4: The archosaurian connection between birds and dinosaurs fascinated researchers.
meanings.sent5: The archosaurian characteristics of the reptile were unmistakable.
